channel.title: Need ideas
channel.description:
So I haven't been making MC videos lately. I stopped at Episode 4 and ran out of ideas. So I'm asking you citizens of MoparCraft to tell me what should I do in my upcoming videos.
Kthx, Seif

item.title: Need ideas
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:7, topic:408557”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=509839.msg3699511#msg3699511 date=1312660184]

[quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=509839.msg3699364#msg3699364 date=1312653349]

[quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=509839.msg3699330#msg3699330 date=1312652307]
Something with redstone; ever since pistons came out, I’ve seen a larger interest in redstone.
[/quote]Problem is, my seed doesn’t have slimes.
[/quote]I thought 10% of chunks were supposed to be slime chunks… If your seed is really that bad just start a new world?
[/quote]No.[/quote]No to what?

“Slimes only spawn in certain chunks that are determined pseudo-randomly by the seed of the world the player is in, and only below layer 16. Roughly 10% of all the chunks will be able to spawn slimes”

Read full topic

item.title: Need ideas
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:5, topic:408557”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=509839.msg3699477#msg3699477 date=1312658520]
Then spawn/inv edit to get sticky pistons and so on
[/quote]:o You said no cheating.[/quote]

Just spawn some sticky pistons, never use it again. In fact, you should travel to a distant land and find a slime chunk.

Read full topic
